_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

Five qualities that cast down a resident: Without examining or scrutinizing, they praise those deserving of criticism
They criticize those deserving of praise without examining or scrutinizing
Without examining or scrutinizing, they arouse faith in things that are dubious
They don’t arouse faith in things that are inspiring without examining or scrutinizing
They waste a gift given in faith
Five qualities that raise up a resident: After examining and scrutinizing, they criticize those deserving of criticism
They praise those deserving of praise after examining and scrutinizing
They don’t arouse faith in things that are dubious
They do arouse faith in things that are inspiring
They don’t waste a gift given in faith
